unnormalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What's Hot on the Indian Roads?
normalised: New Wheels Alert! What's Hot on the Indian Roads?

unnormalised: Namaste folks! Your friendly neighbourhood petrolhead is back with the latest scoop on vehicle launches happening in Bharat. This season is heating up faster than a Maruti 800 stuck in Mumbai traffic!
normalised: Namaste folks! Your friendly neighborhood petrolhead is back with the latest scoop on vehicle launches happening in Bharat. This season is heating up faster than a Maruti eight hundred stuck in Mumbai traffic!

unnormalised: First off, Tata Motors dropped a bomb with their new SUV, the "Tiger Cub" (unofficial nickname, I'm working on it!). Rumours say it's got mileage better than your average Activa and comes in at a price that won't make your wallet weep. We're talking features galore, folks! Expect a launch event complete with chai and samosas, the true Indian way.
normalised: First off, Tata Motors dropped a bomb with their new S U V, the "Tiger Cub" (unofficial nickname, I'm working on it!). Rumours say it's got mileage better than your average Activa and comes in at a price that won't make your wallet weep. We're talking features galore, folks! Expect a launch event complete with chai and samosas, the true Indian way.

unnormalised: Then, there's Mahindra, who are apparently cooking up something seriously rugged. Whispers on the wind suggest a new off-roader capable of conquering the Himalayas (figuratively, of course... mostly). I’m betting on a launch near Manali, showcasing its climbing ability. We'll have to wait and see if they can actually deliver, unlike my cousin's promise to pay me back the Rs. 500 I lent him last Diwali.
normalised: Then, there's Mahindra, who are apparently cooking up something seriously rugged. Whispers on the wind suggest a new off-roader capable of conquering the Himalayas (figuratively, of course... mostly). I’m betting on a launch near Manali, showcasing its climbing ability. We'll have to wait and see if they can actually deliver, unlike my cousin's promise to pay me back the rupee five hundred I lent him last Diwali.

unnormalised: Let's not forget the two-wheeler scene! Bajaj is rumoured to be revamping their Pulsar line with some serious tech upgrades. Think digital dashboards and maybe even some Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam-inspired rocket boosters (okay, maybe not that last one…yet!). They’re promising a showroom revamp too, with each dealer getting at least 1000 sq ft of display area.
normalised: Let's not forget the two-wheeler scene! Bajaj is rumored to be revamping their Pulsar line with some serious tech upgrades. Think digital dashboards and maybe even some Doctor A P J Abdul Kalam-inspired rocket boosters (okay, maybe not that last one…yet!). They’re promising a showroom revamp too, with each dealer getting at least one thousand square feet of display area.

unnormalised: Finally, keep your eyes peeled for Maruti Suzuki's updated WagonR. They are going for the “family-friendly” appeal again and it will probably sell like hot jalebis.
normalised: Finally, keep your eyes peeled for Maruti Suzuki's updated Wagon R. They are going for the “family-friendly” appeal again and it will probably sell like hot jalebis.

unnormalised: So, there you have it! A quick rundown of what's cooking in the Indian automotive scene. Stay tuned for more updates, and remember to always drive safe (and honk politely!). Until next time, Jai Hind!
